welcome_message_body: Welcome to Nay Pyi Taw, the charming capital city of Burma known for its beautiful gardens, majestic pagodas, and rich cultural heritage. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that this vibrant city has to offer.

restaurants.name: Maw Khan Noon (Shan Restaurant)
restaurants.description: Maw Khan Noon (Shan Restaurant) is a asian restaurant located in Naypyidaw.

restaurants.name: Kai Li
restaurants.description: Kai Li is a chinese restaurant located in the city.

restaurants.name: Santino Coffee Restaurant
restaurants.description: Santino Coffee Restaurant is a asian restaurant located in Naypyidaw.
restaurants.address: Nay Pyi Daw, Naypyidaw, Mandalay Region

restaurants.name: Siam Lotus
restaurants.description: Siam Lotus is a thai restaurant located in Naypyidaw.
restaurants.address: No. 11, ThaPyayGone Restaurant Hill, Naypyidaw, Mandalay Region

restaurants.name: Golden Hill Restaurant
restaurants.description: Golden Hill Restaurant is a chinese restaurant located in the city.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Nay Pyi Taw Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for domestic flights only.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Tilin Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Tilin Airport, primarily used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
